bug_reporter.modal.title_placeholder.string: A short description of the bug

bug_reporter.modal.description_placehold.string: Provide detailed information about the bug, including steps to reproduce, expected/actual results, links, and screenshots (paste or upload below).

bug_reporter.modal.include_filekey.string: Include file URL in bug report

fullscreen.color_management.user_color_p.string: This preference applies to new Figma files.

fullscreen.color_management.beta.warning.string: As a beta participant, you'll need to restart your desktop app to use this feature.

fullscreen.color_management.user_color_p.string: Your {client} can’t support Display P3, but you can still export using this profile.
Switch to your {displayName} display for Display P3 support.
Your display can’t support Display P3, but you can still export using this profile.
sRGB is best when designing for a variety of devices, but has a smaller color spectrum than Display P3.
Best for Apple devices, Display P3 has a broader color spectrum—but isn’t recommended for web design.

dev_mode_opt_in.modal.subheader_with_sea.string: Accept Dev Mode’s updated terms of service to approve requests.

dev_mode_opt_in.modal.subheader.string: After reviewing this info, you’ll be ready to manage Dev Mode seats in the admin dashboard. Here’s how you can give your teammates access:

dev_mode_opt_in.modal.pricing.with_desig.string: Figma Design with Dev Mode included for free

dev_mode_opt_in.modal.pricing.dev_mode_o.string: Full access to Dev Mode for less than a Design seat

dev_mode_opt_in.modal.description_questi.string: How will my organization be billed for Dev Mode seats?

dev_mode_opt_in.modal.description_provis.string: Now that Dev Mode is out of beta, any Dev Mode seats provisioned after today are subject to Dev Mode pricing found at {pricingLink}. You're on an {plan} plan, which means Dev Mode users will cost {price} per Dev Mode user per month. Any new seats will be added to your current subscription, meaning they’ll continue for the duration of your existing contract with Figma and will be subject to the same terms (including any auto-renewal terms). You will be charged a prorated amount applicable to the balance of your current subscription period for any Dev Mode seats in your account on your next billing date. Like your other Figma subscriptions, Dev Mode seats are also subject to true-ups. For more information see our {billingLink}.

dev_mode_opt_in.modal.upgrade_seats_erro.string: {seatCount, plural, one {Couldn’t upgrade seat} other {Couldn’t upgrade seats}}

dev_mode_opt_in.modal.upgraded_seats.string: {seatCount, plural, one { 1 seat upgraded} other {{seatCount} seats upgraded}}

memory_warning_modal.old_browser_out_of_.string: Try updating your browser to the latest version or open this file in the {desktopAppLink} to recover content in this file.

memory_warning_modal.reload_modal_conten.string: This file has run out of browser memory. Try reloading the file.
If the problem persists, ask the file owner to reduce memory usage by moving some of the content into a new file.

memory_warning_modal.recovery_mode_modal.string: Open this file in recovery mode
This file has run out of browser memory. Your work isn’t lost, but you won’t be able to use this file unless memory usage is reduced.
In recovery mode, you can access tools and tips to reduce memory use and continue using the file safely.

memory_warning_modal.old_browser_out_of_.string: This file has run out of browser memory
Your work isn’t lost, but you won’t be able to edit the file unless memory usage is reduced.
